mapper.update: UPDATE tb_message_log SET status=#{status}, last_edit_time=#{lastEditTime} WHERE message_id=#{messageId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_message_log( tag,message_id, message,try_count, status, next_retry_time, create_time, last_edit_time )VALUES ( #{tag}, #{messageId}, #{message}, #{tryCount}, #{status}, #{nextRetryTime}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT tag, message_id, message, try_count, status, next_retry_time, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_message_log WHERE tag=#{tag} AND status='0' AND next_retry_time <= sysdate();
